Module.Content:
<script type='text/javascript' src='http://wednus.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/wednus_platform/wednus_compact.js'></script>
<script type='text/javascript' src='http://wednus.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/google_gadgets/wednus_compact_nocache.js'></script>
<script type='text/javascript'>
W.control('AnyBox');
</script>

<script type='text/javascript'>
var a = new W.AnyBox('div');
a.wps = '100,100,xcenter:0,ycenter:0';
a.core.style.background = 'red';
</script>
